usageExample1.message: 1. Click the "Use" button on a prompt card to automatically fill the prompt into the active window.

usageExample2.message: 2. Use {{variable}} syntax in prompts to add variables, making prompts more flexible.

usageExample3.message: 3. Use tags to categorize and manage prompts for easier searching and use.

pleaseFillAllVariables.description: Error message when not all variables are filled

promptProcessedAndCopied.description: Notification when prompt with variables is processed and copied

errorProcessingPrompt.description: Error message when processing prompt fails

realTimePreview.description: Real time preview label in variable modal

cancel.description: Cancel button text in variable modal

apply.description: Apply button text in variable modal

quickSaveSelectionFailed.description: Error message when quick save fails

noTextSelected.description: Error message when no text is selected

resetToDefault.description: Button text for resetting shortcuts to default

shortcutSettingsHint.message: Custom shortcuts will be applied after saving.

currentShortcutsPreview.description: Title for current shortcuts preview section

currentShortcutsInfo.message: To customize these shortcuts, switch to the
currentShortcutsInfo.description: First part of current shortcuts info message

recordingCancelled.description: Message when shortcut recording is cancelled

shortcutRecorded.description: Message when shortcut is successfully recorded

pressDesiredKeys.message: Press your desired key combination now

sameAsOpenPanel.description: Text indicating shortcut is same as open panel

notSet.description: Text indicating something is not set
